quotes.quote: I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect, and I loved you even more.
quotes.author: Angelita Lim

quotes.quote: You don't marry someone you can live with–you marry someone you cannot live without.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: You are, and will always be, my happy place.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: All that you are is all that I'll ever need.
quotes.author: Ed Sheeran

quotes.quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quotes.author: Emily Brontë

quotes.quote: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Forever is a measure of time used by people who share an ordinary love. Our extraordinary love is immeasurable... for us, forever just won't do.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul; that makes us reach for more, that plants the fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds. That's what I hope to give you forever.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: You're nothing short of my everything.
quotes.author: Ralph Block

quotes.quote: I love you straightforwardly, without complexities or pride; so, I love you because I know no other way.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. Love is about how much you love each other every single day.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: In case you ever foolishly forget: I am never not thinking of you.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: True love doesn't demand a happy ending because it doesn't exist to end. It is to cherish each other's presence for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love grows more tremendously full, swift, poignant as the years multiply.
quotes.author: Zane Grey

quotes.quote: Our anniversary is just a momentary celebration, but our marriage is a timeless one.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: We loved a love that was more than love.
quotes.author: Edgar Allen Poe

quotes.quote: I am who I am because of you. You are every reason, every hope, and every dream I've ever had.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: You are my today and all of my tomorrows.
quotes.author: Leo Christopher

quotes.quote: There is no more lovely, friendly, and charming relationship, communion, or company than a good marriage.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: The secret of a happy marriage is finding the right person. You know they're right if you love to be with them all the time.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: I want you for always... days, years, eternities.
quotes.author: Franz Schubert

quotes.quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day, so I never have to live without you.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: I love you, and that's the beginning and end of everything.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: God proved two things when he brought us together: his genius and his sense of humor.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I love you much, most beautiful darling, more than anyone on the earth, and I like you better than everything in the sky.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: An anniversary is a time to celebrate the joys of today, the memories of yesterday, and the hopes of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Yours is the light by which my spirit's born: You are my sun, my moon, and all my stars.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: My soul and your soul are forever tangled.
quotes.author: N. R. Hart

quotes.quote: It was love at first sight, at last sight, and at ever and ever sight.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: May we so love as never to have occasion to repent of our love!
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Comparison is the most dangerous acquaintance love can make.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: In love, as in gluttony, pleasure is a matter of the utmost precision.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.quote: You don’t love a woman because she is beautiful, but she is beautiful because you love her.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love will subsist on wonderfully little hope but not altogether without it.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: What force is more potent than love?
quotes.author: Igor Stravinsky

quotes.quote: Love always brings difficulties, that is true, but the good side of it is that it gives energy.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you… I could walk through my garden forever.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Mong chúng ta có thể yêu thương sao cho không bao giờ phải hối tiếc vì tình yêu của chúng ta.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Sự so sánh là kẻ nguy hiểm nhất mà tình yêu có thể quen.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Trong tình yêu, cũng như trong sự tham lam, lạc thú là vấn đề cần đến sự chính xác tuyệt đối.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.quote: Bạn không yêu người phụ nữ vì nàng đẹp, nhưng nàng đẹp vì bạn yêu nàng.
quotes.author: Khuyết danh

quotes.quote: Tình yêu sẽ tồn tại được chỉ với một chút hy vọng nhỏ nhoi, nhưng sẽ không thể nếu thiếu nó.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Còn thế lực nào mạnh mẽ hơn tình yêu?
quotes.author: Igor Stravinsky

quotes.quote: Tình yêu luôn mang tới khó khăn, đúng vậy, nhưng mặt tốt là nó cũng đem tới sức sống.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Bình tĩnh mà sống, cuộc sống rất ngắn ngủi. Vì vậy hãy sống thật trọn vẹn, chân thành và tử tế!
quotes.author: BeLove

quotes.quote: Hôn nhân là minh chứng cho tình yêu. Đây là cách dễ dàng gắn kết hai con người đến gần nhau hơn.
quotes.author: Sharon Kendrick

quotes.quote: Nếu anh có một đóa hoa mỗi lần anh nghĩ về em… Anh có thể bước đi trong khu vườn của mình mãi mãi.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: Cuộc sống thiếu tình yêu giống như cây không thể ra hoa kết trái.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran
